data: Do not remove epidural/perineural catheter  - For at least 12 hours after the last dose of LMWH (enoxaparin or dalteparin)  - For at least 4 hours after the last dose of heparin    After catheter removal, do not administer  - LMWH (enoxaparin or dalteparin) for at least 4 hours  - Heparin for at least 1 hour
decrease epidural infusion to 4 mL/h at 1600 on date _____, decrease infusion to 2 mL/h at 2200 and stop infusion at 0600 on date _____
Please indicate start date/time for catheter removal
